_sText:
So this is surf_pyrism

It's awful hard.

But awful fun.

Good luck.











Simple enough map, 2 stages, both like short linears. Featuring anti-multiboosts :D

Level 1 is difficult in a few parts, but nothing drastic. Level 2 however is for sure tier 6. Don't judge the map until you play it and actually give it a solid go! Don't just take 2 shots, say FUCK THIS and give up. It's hard, but it is enjoyable.



Any and all constructive criticism is welcome, <3

Thanks to everyone who helped.

Don't ever expect a video. Period.
